title: Slackware-Based Porteus 5.01 Released With Linux Kernel 6.5
description:
Based on the Slackware 15.0 repositories, Porteus 5.01 received a major kernel bump, which will provide better hardware support.

The post Slackware-Based Porteus 5.01 Released With Linux Kernel 6.5 appeared first on Linux Today.

title: LibreOffice 7.6.2 and 7.5.7 Address Critical WebP Vulnerability
description:
LibreOffice 7.6.2 and LibreOffice 7.5.7 contain a fix for CVE 2023-4863, a heap buffer overflow discovered in the widely used libwebp library.

The post LibreOffice 7.6.2 and 7.5.7 Address Critical WebP Vulnerability appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Firefox 119 Promises to Let Users Import Some Chrome Extensions
description:
Firefox 119 promises to let users import some Chrome extensions (if they’re available for Firefox) when migrating data from Google Chrome.

The post Firefox 119 Promises to Let Users Import Some Chrome Extensions appeared first on Linux Today.
